source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenic, static shot captures a coastal landscape on a hazy day. A large, green-topped sea stack sits in the turquoise ocean as waves crash around it, with a modern house visible on a cliff to the right. The only movement comes from the ocean waves and the slight sway of out-of-focus grass in the foreground.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenic, static shot captures a coastal landscape on a hazy day. A large, green-topped sea stack sits in the turquoise ocean as waves crash around it, with a modern house visible on a cliff to the right. The only movement comes from the ocean waves and the slight sway of out-of-focus grass in the foreground.

generated_critique: The caption accurately identifies the static nature of the shot and the main subjects, but it oversimplifies the motion within the scene. The description of the waves as just "crashing" is too generic; a more precise account would describe how the long, rolling swells move from left to right across the screen before breaking into white foam against the sea stack, with the subsequent water receding in visible swirling patterns. Furthermore, the claim that the waves and grass are the "only movement" is likely an omission, as the video clearly shows a few small seabirds circling the top of the sea stack and a slow but perceptible drift of the low-hanging haze from right to left across the upper portion of the frame. A better caption would incorporate these subtle but important movements to provide a more complete and faithful description of the dynamic elements within the otherwise still landscape.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This scenic, static shot captures a coastal landscape on a hazy day. A large, green-topped sea stack sits in the turquoise ocean as long, rolling swells move from left to right across the screen, breaking into white foam against the sea stack and receding in swirling patterns. A modern house is visible on a cliff to the right. The scene includes subtle movements: small seabirds circle the top of the sea stack, the low-hanging haze drifts slowly from right to left across the upper portion of the frame, and the out-of-focus grass in the foreground sways gently.
